PHRASE.LANG: The power is on, but no one is home! This unique head has an animated face that will keep your friends tuned in to whatever you have to say.[#Legal]
Il y a du jus, mais personne n'est là ! Cette tête unique comporte un visage animé changeant vos amis en téléspectateurs avertis. [#Legal]
Der Strom ist an, aber niemand ist zuhause! Dieser einzigartige Kopf mit seinem animierten Gesicht sorgt dafür, dass deine Freunde nie wieder abschalten, wenn du was zu sagen hast.[#Legal]
La TV è accesa, ma nessuno è in casa! Questa fantastica testa ha una faccia animata che terrà sintonizzati i tuoi amici qualsiasi cosa tu dica! [#Legal]
Las luces están encendidas, pero no hay nadie en casa. Esta cabeza única tiene una cara animada que hará que tus amigos no paren de prestar atención a lo que tengas que decir.[#Legal]
전원은 켜졌지만, 집에는 아무도 없습니다! 이 독특한 머리는 당신이 무슨 말을 하든지 친구들의 관심을 사로잡을 수 있는 애니메이션 얼굴을 가지고 있습니다.[#Legal]
The power is on, but no one is home! This unique head has an animated face that will keep your friends tuned in to whatever you have to say.[#Legal]
電源已打開，但是沒人在家！這款獨特的頭套擁有一張讓朋友不斷聽信你謊言的動畫臉。[#Legal]
電源已打開，但是沒人在家！這款獨特的頭套擁有一張讓朋友不斷聽信你謊言的動畫臉。[#Legal]
The power is on, but no one is home! This unique head has an animated face that will keep your friends tuned in to whatever you have to say.[#Legal]
